courses.name: UI Design Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of UI design, including color theory, typography, and layout.

courses.name: Basic Graphic Design Principles
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of graphic design, including composition, typography, and color theory.

courses.name: User Experience Design
courses.description: Discover how to create intuitive and engaging user experiences, including user research, prototyping, and testing.

courses.name: Coding for Designers
courses.description: Learn the basics of coding for designers, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

courses.name: Advanced User Interface Design
courses.description: Take your UI design skills to the next level with advanced topics like motion design, accessibility, and responsive design.

courses.name: Design Thinking
courses.description: Learn how to approach design problems using a human-centered, iterative approach.

courses.name: Web Design Basics
courses.description: Learn the basics of designing for the web, including layout, typography, and responsive design.

courses.name: JavaScript for Designers
courses.description: Learn how to use JavaScript to add interactivity and animation to your designs.
